channel.title: Is it possible that u can go into someone 127.0.0.0.1 thingy?
channel.description: well some one just logged into mine and i dont know how or why but killa didn't and i think i remember him from some where..... oh and i dont get mod taharocks server guide it confuses me.... i dont get the coding and stuff ima just a simple man who wants to make a server with no problem who knows some stuff about computers but i dont know why it has to be that hard to do it... sorry mod taharok but i dotn get your server guide if any one wanna help me please do u can b the co owner of sever if u wanted to....

item.title: Is it possible that u can go into someone 127.0.0.0.1 thingy?
item.dc:creator: @AARisAIR AARisAIR
item.description:
@AARisAIR wrote:

Alright, first NEVER double/tripple post, it is against the rules, hamachi stinks, the ip 127.0.0.0 is a lan IP, no one can use it but you and people on your network. You need to give people your wan ip (http://www.whatismyip.com), make sure you have port forwarding enabled if you have a router, check for tutorials on that.

Read full topic
